blog.description: I DON'T CONDONE HATE OR BASHING OF ANY KIND SO PLEASE KEEP YOUR COMMENTS AND OPINIONS IN YOUR OWN TAGS. IF YOU ADD THEM TO MY POSTS YOU WILL BE BLOCKED. THANK YOU. Writer/Artist/Craftswoman/Admin for The Dalektables/ Huge Nerd and proud of it. David Tennant is my All-Time Favorite Actor and I'm really excited about Good Omens. Interests: Marvel/DC: tv/movies, Supernatural, Doctor Who, Doctor x Rose Shipper (Very anti-moffat.) I also LOVE Jodie and think Chris Chibnall's doing a great job. _______________________ My Fics on ao3................... My fics on FF.Net............... My YouTube Videos............ summary: Out Now: Obverse Books' Black Archive #28 - Love & Monsters
title: Out Now: Obverse Books' Black Archive #28 - Love & Monsters
body:
Out Now: The Black Archive #28 - Love & Monsters by @nikisketches from @obversebooks #DoctorWho

With Valentine’s Day coming up, Obverse Books thought it’d be appropriate to remind us of one of the most touching romances in Doctor Who history: That Chap From Hustle and a paving slab.

No, but seriously, there are plenty of people who love Love & Monsters, including Niki Haringsma, author of the latest edition of The Black Archive! Even if you’re not a fan of the Tenth Doctor tale, this…

View On WordPress

summary:
please tell me you’re all as excited for another round of Ten and Donna madness as I am 
I am ready for the booping 
and for...
body:
please tell me you’re all as excited for another round of Ten and Donna madness as I am

I am ready for the booping

and for Wilf to do his Wilfness

and for bff banter

why do we have to wait until May

tags: historical adventures of Aziraphale and Crowley
summary: I spotted a lovely concept art in the background of a script reading session. It shows a guillotine! Neil promised we'll get to...
body: I spotted a lovely concept art in the background of a script reading session. It shows a guillotine! Neil promised we’ll get to see Aziraphale and Crowley during the French Revolution so I guess that’s the scene where we’ll see that device of macabre beauty! (But whose head will roll?)

reblog.comment: I spotted a lovely concept art in the background of a script reading session. It shows a guillotine! Neil promised we’ll get to see Aziraphale and Crowley during the French Revolution so I guess that’s the scene where we’ll see that device of macabre beauty! (But whose head will roll?)

trail.content_raw: I spotted a lovely concept art in the background of a script reading session. It shows a guillotine! Neil promised we’ll get to see Aziraphale and Crowley during the French Revolution so I guess that’s the scene where we’ll see that device of macabre beauty! (But whose head will roll?)
trail.content: I spotted a lovely concept art in the background of a script reading session. It shows a guillotine! Neil promised we’ll get to see Aziraphale and Crowley during the French Revolution so I guess that’s the scene where we’ll see that device of macabre beauty! (But whose head will roll?)
